chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 13 has the above problem: 
There's a serious issue with delivery. The package should have been delivered last Thursday by UPS, was then shown as in transit and didn't appear. A day later someone from UPS stopped by to inquire about the whereabouts of the package but couldn't provide any further information. If I understand correctly, there was an issue on the UPS side with a subcontractor. Now I've checked the tracking today and it says that as the sender, you can file a claim for replacement. https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_de&requester=QUIC&tracknum=1ZBF1560D901151036/trackdetails. It seems like the package has gone missing. I'd like to know what my next steps are. And if the iPhone isn't delivered within the next few days, I'd appreciate a refund. Thank you so much! 
Thank you for your help,

Hello!


The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Tania - Back Market

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

 You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

 
This order will be refunded in 24 hours 

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Tania - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Please ask the customer to prepare a CND where all the details are handwritten in the case where the current CND is rejected. In the meantime please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
CH

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
